trans-unit.source: Use the `MergeLocalizationDirectives` element in your project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: Använd den `MergeLocalizationDirectives` element i projektfilen för att skapa och köra den här uppgiften.

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [MergeLocalizationDirectives](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Information om syntax och parametrar, se [MergeLocalizationDirectives](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MergeLocalizationDirectives"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Windows.MergeLocalizationDirectives"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the task executed successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om aktiviteten utfördes; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the list of localization directives files for individual files in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] binary format.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger listan över lokalisering direktiven filer för de enskilda filerna i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] binärt format.

trans-unit.source: The list of localization directives files for individual files in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] binary format.
trans-unit.target: Listan över direktiven lokaliseringsfiler för de enskilda filerna i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] binärt format.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the output path of the compiled localization-directives assembly.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger sökvägen för utdata för sammansättningen kompilerade lokalisering-direktiv.

trans-unit.source: The output path of the compiled localization-directives assembly.
